泧泧泧

泧字的基本解释

泧
yuè
〔泧漷（
ku?）〕水势激荡汹涌的样子。

泧
sà
〔瀎泧〕ａ．抹杀。ｂ．抚慰。

泧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuè］
［《廣韻》許月切，入月，曉。］
［《廣韻》王伐切，入月，云。］
见“泧漷”。
[②]［huò］
［《廣韻》呼括切，入末，曉。］
见“泧2泧”。

泧字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泧； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页618第04
【廣韻】【集韻】?王伐切，音越。大水貌。【郭璞·江賦】潰濩泧漷。【註】皆水勢相激涌之貌。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?許月切，音䬂。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?呼括切，音豁。【說文】瀎泧也。又【博雅】泧泧，流也。　又【集韻】桑葛切，音薩。義同。

泧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
泧字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
yuè
〔泧漷(
ku?)] The water is turbulent.
Li
sà
〔Ying 泧〕 a. Obliterate. b. Comfort.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuè］
["Guang Yun" Xu Yue cuts, enters the moon, dawn. ]
["Guangyun" Wang Faqie, into the moon, cloud. ]
See "Liaotong".
[②]［huò］
["Guangyun" call to cut, enter the end, Xiao. ]
See "Liu 2 Lu".
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　泧; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 618 04
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wang Faqie, Yinyue. Great water appearance. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] The sacred river was broken. [Note] The appearance of all water surges.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Xu Yueqie, sound. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Huoqie, sound is open. [Said the text] Yingya also. Also 【Bo Ya】Liulu, flow also.　[Jiyun] Sangge cut, Yinsa. The same meaning.
Li
